MCP Payment Wrapper

Payment wrapper for Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers that adds payment verification and billing functionality

MCP Payment Wrapper API Reference / LoggerOptions

Interface: LoggerOptions

Defined in: utils/logger.ts:32

Options for configuring the logger

Properties

customLogger?

optional customLogger: Logger

Defined in: utils/logger.ts:51

Custom logger instance (for testing)

Log level (debug, info, warn, error)

Path to the log file

Defined in: utils/logger.ts:41

Whether the server is using stdio transport
